translation.ja: ホワイトボードに書いた事が ようやく実現です

translation.ja: クランフィールド大学 このトイレはネジで 尿と便を分別し―

translation.ja: 便の燃焼エネルギーで ネジを駆動します

translation.en: All that's left...
translation.ja: 残るのは…

translation.en: a small pile of ash.
translation.ja: 少量の灰のみ

translation.en: This squat toilet dries then burns waste
translation.ja: しゃがむトイレは 排泄物を燃やし― しゃがむトイレは 排泄物を燃やし― トロント大学 しゃがむトイレは 排泄物を燃やし―

translation.ja: その熱で尿を消毒します

translation.en: And this one is powered by solar panels,
translation.ja: これは太陽光給電式 これは太陽光給電式 カルテック(カリフォルニア工科大)

translation.en: and uses an oxygen composting process.
translation.ja: カルテック(カリフォルニア工科大) 酸素で堆肥化します 酸素で堆肥化します

translation.en: The by-products: fertilizer and water for flushing.
translation.ja: 副生成物は 肥料と洗浄用の水です

translation.en: We really do see ourselves on a cusp of a sanitation revolution.
translation.ja: 私たちは今 公衆衛生革命の 幕開けにいます

translation.en: [director] Many of these toilets require no outside electricity or plumbing.
translation.ja: このトイレは電気や配管を 必要としません

translation.en: And they were ready to replace the pit latrine forever.
translation.ja: 落とし便所を 永久に変えるでしょう

translation.en: But the capital cost?
translation.ja: 投資額は？

translation.en: For the time being, about $50,000, uh, US dollars.
translation.ja: 今のところ５万米ドルです

translation.en: The cost of this now is around, uh, 50,000.
translation.ja: このコストが現在５万ドル

translation.en: [director] For all the progress,
translation.ja: 普及させるには―

translation.en: Bill knew that a $50,000 toilet was way out of reach.
translation.ja: ５万ドルのトイレでは 高すぎます

translation.en: [Bill] This thing's gonna have to cost less than $500.
translation.ja: １台500ドル未満で なければならない

translation.en: And right now we're more than ten times greater than that.
translation.ja: 今はその10倍以上だ

translation.en: [director] The solution:
translation.ja: 解決策は…

translation.en: find a partner in this room to manufacture it and bring the cost down.
translation.ja: 量産でコストを下げられる 製造業者を見つける事

translation.en: [Bill] I brought a little exhibit here.
translation.ja: 展示品があります

translation.en: This is a...
translation.ja: これは…

translation.en: container of human feces.
translation.ja: 人間の便の入った容器

translation.en: Inside there could be over 200 million rotavirus particles,
translation.ja: 中には２億個の ロタウイルスが含まれてます

translation.en: twenty billion shigella bacteria,
translation.ja: 赤痢菌は200億個

translation.en: and a hundred thousand parasitic worm eggs.
translation.ja: 寄生虫の卵は10万個です

translation.en: That's what kids, when they're out playing, they're being exposed to all the time.
translation.ja: 子供が外で遊ぶ時 それだけに触れてます

translation.en: [director] If he failed, it would be seven years of work
translation.ja: 失敗すれば７年の努力と―

translation.en: and 200 million dollars wasted.
translation.ja: ２億ドルが無駄になります

translation.en: [director] As a businessman, what are your blindsides?
translation.ja: 事業者として弱点は？

translation.en: What are the moments that you feel like, "Oh, this is what I'm not so good at"?
translation.ja: 自分に長けていないと 感じる点はあります？

translation.en: Well, innovation-based businesses are the only ones that I bring anything... to it all.
translation.ja: 革新ベースの事業だけが 僕が貢献できるところだろう

translation.en: [Bill] I like to push the level of risk of doing things
translation.ja: 何でもリスクの限界を 越えることは―

translation.en: that wouldn't happen without leadership and vision.
translation.ja: リーダーが率先しないと 起こらない

translation.en: [director] In only 18 months,
translation.ja: たった18ヶ月で

translation.en: Peter and his team were able to build a working prototype of a stand-alone treatment plant.
translation.ja: ピーター達は下水処理の 試作品を完成させました

translation.en: They called it the Omni Processor.
translation.ja: 名前はオムニプロセッサー

translation.en: And the machine worked exactly the way they imagined it would.
translation.ja: 想像した通りの設備です

translation.en: [Peter] So this is the solution when, you empty pit latrines, and instead of dumping all this stuff in the river,
translation.ja: これは落とし便所の排泄物を 川に捨てるのではなく―

translation.en: you bring it to a centralized Omni Processor.
translation.ja: オムニプロセッサーに 集める

translation.en: It evaporates the water, solids go into a fire,
translation.ja: 水は蒸発させ 固形物は火に投入する

translation.en: we burn them, we boil more steam,
translation.ja: 燃やすと さらに沸騰で蒸気が生成され

translation.en: and drive a steam engine to make electricity to drive the whole process.
translation.ja: 蒸気エンジンを駆動し 自己給電する

translation.en: [director] It requires no external power and no outside water.
translation.ja: 外部の電気や水は 必要としません

translation.en: -[metal clatters] -And in the end, the only byproducts
translation.ja: 最終的に副生成物は―

translation.en: are electricity, ash,
translation.ja: 電気と灰

translation.en: and clean, drinkable water.
translation.ja: そして飲料水だけです

translation.en: We're, you know, looking at all these water samples coming out of the Omni Processor.
translation.ja: オムニプロセッサーから 出てくる水は…

translation.en: [Peter] You know where it came from, you can see the pile of shit that it came from five minutes ago.
translation.ja: ５分前に届いた排泄物から とったと分かります

translation.en: He just grabs a glass and he takes a look at it
translation.ja: ビルはグラスを少しみて

translation.en: -and boom! Just tastes like water. -[Bill speaks indistinctly]
translation.ja: ごくっ 水みたい

translation.en: [director] But building a prototype in just 18 months wasn't enough.
translation.ja: 試作品に18ヶ月では 遅すぎます

translation.en: Bill pushed Peter to get this machine up and running where people needed it.
translation.ja: ビルは現地で製作するよう 求めました

translation.en: [Peter] I have access to hundreds of mechanics and engineers and electricians,
translation.ja: 機械工やエンジニアや 電気技師が数百人います

translation.en: and getting it to run every day is a piece of cake.
translation.ja: 稼働させるのは楽勝です

translation.en: But sending it to Dakar and getting it up and running--
translation.ja: ダカールに送って 設備製作と立ち上げは―

translation.en: but to actually do that is kind of a big deal.
translation.ja: 大変なことです

translation.en: [Kristi] Early on at Microsoft, my mom became sort of his right-hand person.
translation.ja: マイクロソフトの初期は 母が右腕の役割を担ってたわ

translation.en: [Libby] When he bought a house, making sure he actually had a house cleaner,
translation.ja: ビルが家を買うと 掃除屋を予定し

translation.en: helping him have a wardrobe when he was getting a photograph taken for some magazine.
translation.ja: 雑誌の撮影時には 洋服を選ぶ手伝いも

translation.en: [Kristi] I think he was very happy with that
translation.ja: 満足してたはずよ

translation.en: 'cause as a 25, 26-year-old guy,
translation.ja: 25〜26歳の男にとって

translation.en: he, that was great, "I don't have to worry about all this stuff."
translation.ja: 心配しなくて良いのは 助かるわ

translation.en: She made him be really thoughtful early in his life at Microsoft
translation.ja: マイクロソフトでも ビルに早い時期から―

translation.en: about what it meant to be a community contributor and the importance of that.
translation.ja: 地域社会への還元について 考えさせていた

translation.en: She introduced him back into the community, she,
translation.ja: 地域社会にビルを紹介し

translation.en: you know, got him involved in United Way.
translation.ja: 募金活動にも参加させた

translation.en: She was his guidepost.
translation.ja: ビルの道しるべだったの

translation.en: I never thought that he, you know, at that point,
translation.ja: ビルと結婚する人が いるなんて

translation.en: that he'd get anybody to marry him.
translation.ja: 思わなかったわ

translation.en: Melinda and my mom got along really well.
translation.ja: メリンダと母は仲良し

translation.en: I think my mom did a great job of sort of realizing that she needed to step back a little bit.
translation.ja: 母も少し手を引くべきだと よく気づいたと思うわ

translation.en: [director] Do you think he knew how serious her cancer was?
translation.ja: ガンの容態は知ってました？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: -[somber instrumentals] -[Bill] She was becoming very frail.
translation.ja: すごく衰弱していた

translation.en: It was pretty clear...
translation.ja: 長くても…

translation.en: she had at most...
translation.ja: １年だろうと…

translation.en: a year to live.
translation.ja: 分かってた…

translation.en: [Kristi] He did everything he could and...
translation.ja: ビルは手を尽くした

translation.en: he looked into trials
translation.ja: 臨床実験を調べ

translation.en: and what the different options were for treatment, and...
translation.ja: 治療オプションも 検討していた

translation.en: it was just a little too early in the progression of cancer research to really help her.
translation.ja: ガン研究がまだ未熟すぎて 母を救えなかったの

translation.en: My mom loved Melinda and thought that she was a great...
translation.ja: 母はメリンダのことを 気に入ってた

translation.en: addition to the family and perfect for my brother.
translation.ja: 弟にぴったりだって

translation.en: Right around the time that Bill and Melinda were getting married,
translation.ja: ビルとメリンダが 結婚した時には

translation.en: she was quite ill.
translation.ja: かなり具合が悪かった

translation.en: She died the June after they got married.
translation.ja: 結婚後の６月に亡くなったの

translation.en: She died of breast cancer.
translation.ja: 乳ガンで

translation.en: [director] What was the worst day in your life?
translation.ja: 最悪の日はいつ？

translation.en: Mmm, like the day my mother died.
translation.ja: 母が亡くなった日

translation.en: [Bill] My mom had been fading quite a bit.
translation.ja: 母はかなり衰弱していた

translation.en: And so I'm driving...
translation.ja: だから実家に向かって…

translation.en: to the house I grew up in.
translation.ja: 運転してたんだ

translation.en: -And I'm speeding... -[engine revs] -[police siren whoops] -...and I get pulled over.
translation.ja: スピード違反でつかまって…

translation.en: -[footsteps approaching] -The officer walks up...
translation.ja: 警官が来た

translation.en: and I was just sobbing.
translation.ja: 僕はただすすり泣いてた

translation.en: And I say, "My mom died and I'm going home."
translation.ja: “母が亡くなったから 実家に行く”と言った

translation.en: Even though we had expected it...
translation.ja: 予期はしていた…

translation.en: and here it was.
translation.ja: でも…

translation.en: Mom was gone.
translation.ja: 母がいない

translation.en: [Libby] When things are difficult emotionally,
translation.ja: 感情で苦しい時は

translation.en: he goes to his safe space, which is intellect.
translation.ja: 安心できる知的空間に行くの

translation.en: It's hard for him to feel pain.
translation.ja: 痛みを感じない場所

translation.en: I think it was an extraordinary loss for him.
translation.ja: 喪失感が大きかった

translation.en: And I kind of wonder, you know, whether there was some...
translation.ja: だから何かやり残した事が…

translation.en: some things that were left undone for him.
translation.ja: あったのかなと思うわ

translation.en: She would be so prou--
translation.ja: 母は絶対に…

translation.en: I mean, it's a shame she's not here
translation.ja: 生きてなくて残念よ

translation.en: 'cause she would be so proud of him.
translation.ja: きっとビルを誇りに思うわ

translation.en: But she...
translation.ja: でも…

translation.en: Yeah. Um...
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: [stammers] It's a shame she's not here.
translation.ja: いないのは残念

translation.en: [director] If she could see you today, you think she'd be proud of you?
translation.ja: 誇りに思ってくれます？

translation.en: I think so.
translation.ja: そう思うね

translation.en: She never thought my table manners were perfect.
translation.ja: 食事の行儀は良くない

translation.en: I don't think I've, uh... solved that.
translation.ja: それは 今も変わってない

translation.en: So she'd have, you know, still things that... uh, she'd encourage me to do better on.
translation.ja: だから お小言を言う点は あるだろうね

translation.en: [Kristi] Taking his brain and putting it in our family with my mom...
translation.ja: ビルの脳に家族をたたき込み

translation.en: pushing him to do the social stuff...
translation.ja: 社交するよう勧めたの

translation.en: that's all stuff that got him...
translation.ja: そういった事があったから

translation.en: sort of to focus his brain...
translation.ja: ビルは学習や 教育だけでなく―

translation.en: not just on the learning and the educational part,
translation.ja: ビルは学習や 教育だけでなく― 行動する人になったの

translation.en: but more on the doing part.
translation.ja: 行動する人になったの

translation.en: [director] Today in Dakar,
translation.ja: ダカールでは今…

translation.en: the Omni Processor is treating one-third of the city's fecal sludge...
translation.ja: オムニプロセッサーが 汚泥の３分の１を処理し―

translation.en: and providing clean, drinkable water.
translation.ja: 飲料水を提供しています

translation.ja: ジャーナリズムでは 今日の出来事を書きます

translation.en: We're all over a press conference, an explosion.
translation.ja: 記者会見に全て出ます

translation.en: We don't cover things that happen every day.
translation.ja: 日々の事は書きません

translation.en: We tend to miss those stories about the everyday suffering.
translation.ja: 日々の苦しみは 見落としがちなのです

translation.en: And we miss the story about everyday improvement in living conditions.
translation.ja: また生活の日々の改善も 見落とします

translation.en: Because things that happen every day are never quite news.
translation.ja: 毎日起きることは ニュースではないからです

translation.en: There's this battle for eyeballs in the journalism world.
translation.ja: ジャーナリズムは 視聴率競争です

translation.en: And covering global health is not a way to get eyeballs.
translation.ja: 世界健康では 読者を増やせない

translation.en: [Nicholas] This article was quickly forgotten
translation.ja: この記事もすぐ忘れられ―

translation.ja: 例外はシアトルの重要な 読者２人でした

Lixil, one of the world's largest manufacturers,
translation.ja: 世界屈指の製造業者 リクシルが―
